concept.title: 5225.403 World Trade Organization Government Procurement Agreement and Free Trade Agreements.

conbody.p: (c)(ii) Submit requests for national interest waivers in the form of a determination and findings with a copy of the approved AS, STRAP, or MOPAS-S to the USD(A&S)/DPC via DASN(P) by email at https://psctool.us with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 225.403 - National Interest Waivers.”
